name: Majorelle Mystery
description:
As part of the Coding da Vinci Saar-Lor-Lux 2020 we started developing a prototype game using data and images from the Villa Majorelle in Nancy.  With the help of a stipend afterwards, we were able to continue development to the point of this playable release.

Majorelle Mystery is an Escape Room inspired Point-and-Click game. As you enter the Villa Majorelle, you will need to solve puzzles to make your way through the Villa and free it from plants that are blocking doors in between rooms. If interested, you can also learn more about the Villa Majorelle by talking to the ghosts that you will encounter.

Estimated playing time is about 16-25 min.
